channel.title: Blue Shift
channel.description: I would like to have a blue shift in source to, maybe it could be a future project. I think it could be called "Guard Duty" or something else like that.

item.title: Blue Shift
item.dc:creator: dinnsfire5
item.description:
lol @ original post. About 3 years ago, summer of 09, I think. I always lurked these forums, the Operation Black Mesa forums, and guard Duty Forums, and all. Then, I just kinda started to be a normal user here. Recently though, I’ve seen that merge, I’ve seen that Hazard Team is making progress, I’ve seen that Opposing Force 2 is about to die, and all this new news I’ve missed the past 2 years.

Read full topic

item.title: Blue Shift
item.dc:creator: neuroboy
item.description:
I’ve not played Blue-Shift in about a decade, but I recall that for some reason I loved it and played it almost as much as the original Half-Life… unlike Opposing Force, which I never really liked and only played through once.

I would love to see this remake really get off the ground, and hope that I can play it before the year 2019, about the time Half-Life 2: Episode 3 gets released.

Read full topic

item.title: Blue Shift
item.dc:creator: MacD11
item.description:
Guard Duty is being made by the same people who are remaking Opposing Force as “Operation Black Mesa”.

OBM is actually looking good, and there are a few guard duty screenshots, but im pretty sure they are old.

https://www.moddb.com/mods/operation-black-mesa

Also, someone made part of the Blue Shift intro with Black Mesa assets, and it looks good.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DwW7jDxzqek

Read full topic
